news.content:
The ThreeFold Token is now available on 1inch.io!

1inch connects many third party DEXes and has its own liquidity pools as well, to provide the best possible pricing for end users. It is an easy entry to the DeFi space.

ðŸŽ’ Learn how to get TFT on the Binance Smart Chain using 1inch here.
news.excerpt: The ThreeFold Token is now available on DeFi entry point 1inch!

previous.title: TFT is more accessible; now available via PancakeSwap and a BTC Integration on ThreeFold Connect
previous.excerpt: Today, the bridge to BSC is live, making TFT available on PancakeSwap! And anyone can now buy TFT with BTC directly on the ThreeFold Connect app.

next.title: ThreeFold Q1 Highlights
next.excerpt: A lot unfolded in our universe the last three months. Find out all you need to know in our Q1 Recap!
